page.title: 03The Animal Sanctuary
page.content:
The{Margaret Green Animal Sanctuary has been run by Margaret Green since 1969 with a staff of volunteer helpers. It provides shelter for up to 250 abandoned or neglected animals at any one time. These are mainly cats, though the sanctuary also looks after horses, donkeys, goats, geese and rabbits. The aim is to find new homes for the animals wherever possible.
The sanctuary is open to the public seven days a week throughout the year and their work depends on the donations that result. Around 5000 people a year visit the sanctuary.
